#: {{zh-x|即食麵 係 將 麵 壓 成 一塊，用 棕櫚油 炸 到 佢 硬 晒，到 食 嗰陣 就 只{zi2} 需要 用 滾水 一 淥，溶 咗 啲 棕櫚油，兩 三 分鐘 就 食 得。|'''Instant noodles''' are noodles compressed into a slab and fried in palm oil until solid, and when it is eaten, one only needs to boil water and dissolve the palm oil, and it is edible in two or three minutes.|C|ref='''2010''', ''Cantonese Wikipedia'', [[w:zh-yue:即食麪|即食麪]]}}
